import { useRef } from 'react'; import uniqid from 'uniqid' const MyBusinessComp = () => { const inputTokenInfluencer = useRef(null); const handleCreateTokenInfluencer = () => { inputTokenInfluencer.current.value = `${uniqid()}-blets`; } const fetchApi = async () => { await fetch('http://localhost:4000/api', {method: 'POST', mode: 'cors', body: JSON.stringify({user: 'tobias nazareno bregante'})}) .then(data => data.json()) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } fetchApi() return( <>
